SENT.plain: A 14-year-old boy admitted to our clinic with a 20-day history of fever, cough and respiratory distress
Mediastinal enlargement was observed on chest radiograph
Computed tomography of the chest demonstrated a large posterior mediastinal mass
The histopathological examination of the mass revealed Burkitt's lymphoma
We report this case because primary posterior mediastinal involvement in Burkitt lymphoma is extremely rare in childhood
